column4: all I did was install the Ubuntu Nvidia drivers by enabling the restricted drivers in the Synaptic repos
Ah, okay.  I had no problems installing the drivers. Im just trying to ascertain why my 3D program insists that it cant use the stereo buffer of my vid  card
stereo buffer is a video card issue? I would have thought of sound problem with that error. That shows you what I know eh?

Yeah. I dont know why its not working now. Only noticed it cuz I tried to render out some shapes in Maya.  Then  I got this error: Warning: Unable to get OpenGL visual with a stereo buffer, trying without //.
